<label posn="35 -13" z-index="1" halign="center" valign="center" textsize="2" textfont="BiryaniDemiBold" text="for the  tag."/>
			
			
		

		
		
			
		
		
		
			
			
		
		
			
			
		
		
			
			
		
		
			
			
		
		
			
			
		
		
			
			
		
		
			
			
		
		
			
			
		
		
			
			
		
		
			
			
		
		
			
			<label posn="5 -3" z-index="1" textsize="3" style="TextValueSmallSm" text="About "/>
		

		
		
		
		
			
				
			
			
				
				<label posn="-95 45" sizen="190 60" z-index="2" textsize="2" autonewline="1" text="$s$f00It is required to visit this manialink on your maniaplanet home menu. Otherwise you won't see the 3D elements.

$0af$iStyles 3D$i$g  is an extension to the existing $0af$hstyles$h$g manialink with the missing  tags from the maniaplanet documentation ($ldoc.maniaplanet.com$l) and other elements such as the introduction to the  and .
It Includes all the different  tags, their manipulation to color, size etc. and how to enable and manipulate the menu clouds background with the  tag.
You can move this entire Manialink around like the stations from the maniaplanet main menu. Just hold the mouse button and move it around. This feature is also important for some special  tags and some of their attributes to understand its concept.

You can find more details in the ''About '' section.

$0afThis Manialink is still in development and misses alot of information at the moment as the maniaplanet forum is not reachable for now (2025-12-23)."/>
				
			
		

		
		
			
			<entry posn="-35 50" sizen="85 5" z-index="1" textfont="BiryaniDemiBold" default=''/>
			<label posn="-150 40" textfont="BiryaniDemiBold" halign="left" valign="top" sizen="280 30" autonewline="1" text="$sDefault size of this element is 320x180 (whole manialink page) and is fixed. Meaning It's impossible to manipulate it through the ''sizen'' or ''scale'' attribute.
You have to edit it through the ''zoffset'' attribute in a  inside a  tag where you set your style3d presets. It puts the station further away from you in a 3-dimensional space instead of shrinking it. A  preset is down below.

Example:"/>
			<textedit posn="-145 10" sizen="300 25" autonewline="1" textsize="2" z-index="1" style="StyleTextScriptEditor" showlinenumbers="1" default='
	
		
	
'/>
		
		
		
		
			
				
				<textedit posn="-35 30" sizen="70 10" textsize="3" textfont="BiryaniDemiBold" default='
'/>
			
			
				<label posn="5 50" sizen="90 20" z-index="2" textsize="2" textfont="BiryaniDemiBold" autonewline="1" text="BaseBoxCase:
You can create a Box Case with the predefined tag shown on the BoxCase or with the help of the  tag:"/>
<textedit posn="15 35" sizen="80 20" autonewline="1" textsize="2" z-index="1" style="StyleTextScriptEditor" showlinenumbers="1" default='
	
		
	
'/>
			
		
		
			<label posn="-45 0" sizen="90 100" valign="center" autonewline="1" textsize="2" text="Titlelogo is based on the ''Floating'' model which has no 3d model at all but it enables the tags inside like the other  tags to be movable.

Manialink tag:"/>
		<textedit posn="-45 -10" sizen="70 5" textsize="2" textfont="BiryaniDemiBold" default=''/>

				<label posn="0 5" z-index="1" halign="center" valign="center" textsize="8" textfont="BiryaniDemiBold" style="" text="About "/>
				<label posn="0 -5" z-index="1" halign="center" valign="center" textsize="3" textfont="BiryaniDemiBold" text="More information on how the  tag works and which other tags you can include in."/>
			
			
				
				
					<label sizen="240 50" textsize="1.5" style="Manialink_Body" autonewline="true" text="$s$08fThe  tag is a special manialink tag in which you can create and edit presets of your  tags as well as manipulating the  background.$z$s
$0afThis section contains the usage of the  tag.	$g	

A  tag is a section in  where you create your  tags inside it to define your presets for your  tags. In the  tag you can create your  preset style by defining attributes of your 3d model type, thickness of that model, the offset, color, lighting color and when It gets focused by your mouse when you hover on it. You define your ''id'' in the  tag which you'll later use it for your  element.

An example of a  preset like the buttons on the left side of this manialink is shown below:"/>
					<textedit posn="10 -30" sizen="230 36" textsize="1" style="StyleTextScriptEditor" autonewline="true" showlinenumbers="1" default=' 
	
		
			
		
	
	
		
		
	
' />
				
				
				<label posn="60 -90" textsize="1.5" style="StyleTextScriptEditor" scriptevents="0" autonewline="true" text="" textcolor="0AF"/>
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<label posn="45 -110" textsize="1.5" style="StyleTextScriptEditor" scriptevents="0" autonewline="true" text="" textcolor="0AF"/>
				
				<label posn="138 -110" textsize="1.5" style="StyleTextScriptEditor" scriptevents="0" autonewline="true" text="" textcolor="0AF"/>
				
				
				<label posn="0 -122" textsize="1.5" style="Manialink_Body" autonewline="true" text="$s$f00To Do:  (explanation of LDir0, LDir1, ...), "/>
				
				
					<label sizen="240 50" textsize="1.5" style="Manialink_Body" autonewline="true" text="$s$08fThe  tag is a special manialink tag in which you can create and edit presets of your  tags as well as manipulating the  background.$z$s
$0afThis section contains the usage of the  tag.	$g

The  tag has the feature to manipulate the background of the maniaplanet main menu. It can manipulate the color, the light colors and intensity and also the gradient with the  tag inside of the  tag.

An example manialink with the  tag with colors from the maniaplanet main menu and an example  tag is shown below:"/>
				<textedit posn="10 -25" sizen="102 99" textsize="1" style="StyleTextScriptEditor" autonewline="true" showlinenumbers="1" default='
	
		
			
				
				
				
				
			
		
	
' />
				
				
				
					
					
					
					
				
			
			
				
				
			
		

		


#Include "TextLib" as TL
#Include "MathLib" as ML		

main () {
	declare CMlFrame[Text] Navigation = [
		"Button_Home"				=> (Page.GetFirstChild("Frame_Home")		as CMlFrame),
		"Button_BaseStation"		=> (Page.GetFirstChild("Frame_BaseStation")	as CMlFrame),
		"Button_BaseBoxCase"		=> (Page.GetFirstChild("Frame_BaseBoxCase")	as CMlFrame),
		"Button_Titlelogo"			=> (Page.GetFirstChild("Frame_Titlelogo")	as CMlFrame),
		"Button_ButtonBack"			=> (Page.GetFirstChild("Frame_ButtonBack")	as CMlFrame),
		"Button_ButtonNav"			=> (Page.GetFirstChild("Frame_ButtonNav")	as CMlFrame),
		"Button_ButtonH"			=> (Page.GetFirstChild("Frame_ButtonH")		as CMlFrame),
		"Button_Station3x3"			=> (Page.GetFirstChild("Frame_Station3x3")	as CMlFrame),
		"Button_Title"				=> (Page.GetFirstChild("Frame_Title")		as CMlFrame),
		"Button_TitleEditor"		=> (Page.GetFirstChild("Frame_TitleEditor")	as CMlFrame),
		"Button_Window"				=> (Page.GetFirstChild("Frame_Window")		as CMlFrame),
		"Button_Stylesheet"			=> (Page.GetFirstChild("Frame_Stylesheet")	as CMlFrame)
	];

	declare CMlFrame[] StylesheetPages = [
		(Page.GetFirstChild("StylesheetPage_0") as CMlFrame),
		(Page.GetFirstChild("StylesheetPage_1") as CMlFrame)
	];

	declare StylesheetNavFirst  <=> (Page.GetFirstChild("StylesheetNavFirst")  as CMlQuad);
	declare StylesheetNavNext   <=> (Page.GetFirstChild("StylesheetNavNext")   as CMlQuad);
	declare StylesheetNavPrev   <=> (Page.GetFirstChild("StylesheetNavPrev")   as CMlQuad);
	declare StylesheetNavLast   <=> (Page.GetFirstChild("StylesheetNavLast")   as CMlQuad);

	declare StyleButtonExample <=> (Page.GetFirstChild("StyleButtonExample") as CMlFrame);

	foreach (NavPage in Navigation) {
		NavPage.Hide();
	}
	foreach (StylesheetPage in StylesheetPages) {
		StylesheetPage.Hide();
	}
	declare Integer CurrentStylesheetPage = 0;
	Navigation["Button_Home"].Show();
	StylesheetPages[CurrentStylesheetPage].Show();

	while(True) {
		yield;
		foreach(Event in PendingEvents) {
			switch (Event.Type) {
				case CMlScriptEvent::Type::MouseClick: {
					foreach(Button => Frame in Navigation) {
						switch (Event.ControlId) {
							case Button: {
								foreach (Element in Navigation) {
									Element.Hide();
								}
								Frame.Show();
							}
						}
					}
					switch (Event.ControlId) {
						case "StylesheetNavNext": {
							CurrentStylesheetPage += 1;
							if (CurrentStylesheetPage == 0) {
								StylesheetNavPrev.Hide();
								StylesheetNavLast.Hide();
								StylesheetNavNext.Show();
								StylesheetNavFirst.Show();
								StyleButtonExample.Show();
							}
							else if (CurrentStylesheetPage == StylesheetPages.count - 1) {
								StylesheetNavPrev.Show();
								StylesheetNavLast.Show();
								StylesheetNavNext.Hide();
								StylesheetNavFirst.Hide();
								StyleButtonExample.Hide();
							}
							else {
								StylesheetNavPrev.Show();
								StylesheetNavLast.Hide();
								StylesheetNavNext.Show();
								StylesheetNavFirst.Hide();
								StyleButtonExample.Hide();
							}
							StylesheetPages[CurrentStylesheetPage - 1].Hide();
							StylesheetPages[CurrentStylesheetPage].Show();
							log(CurrentStylesheetPage);
							break;
						}
						case "StylesheetNavPrev": {
							CurrentStylesheetPage -= 1;
							if (CurrentStylesheetPage == 0) {
								StylesheetNavPrev.Hide();
								StylesheetNavLast.Hide();
								StylesheetNavNext.Show();
								StylesheetNavFirst.Show();
								StyleButtonExample.Show();
							}
							else if (CurrentStylesheetPage == StylesheetPages.count - 1) {
								StylesheetNavPrev.Show();
								StylesheetNavLast.Show();
								StylesheetNavNext.Hide();
								StylesheetNavFirst.Hide();
								StyleButtonExample.Hide();
							}
							else {
								StylesheetNavPrev.Show();
								StylesheetNavLast.Hide();
								StylesheetNavNext.Show();
								StylesheetNavFirst.Hide();
								StyleButtonExample.Hide();
							}
							StylesheetPages[CurrentStylesheetPage + 1].Hide();
							StylesheetPages[CurrentStylesheetPage].Show();
							log(CurrentStylesheetPage);
							break;
						}
					}
					
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
